context: Tests edge case handling including file naming constraints, overwrite protection, and complex technical scenarios.

checklist.name: Schema loading first
checklist.description: Evidence shows template schema was read before attempting generation

checklist.name: Lowercase filename slug
checklist.description: Converts technical terms to lowercase hyphenated format (api-gateway-cloudwatch not API_Gateway_CloudWatch)

checklist.name: No underscores in slug
checklist.description: Uses hyphens instead of underscores in filename slug

checklist.name: Overwrite protection
checklist.description: Asks user permission before overwriting existing file or creates alternative filename

checklist.name: Current date usage
checklist.description: Uses current date (2025-02-27) for filename, frontmatter, and H1

checklist.name: Directory structure
checklist.description: Places file in 2025/02/ directory matching the current date

checklist.name: Date format precision
checklist.description: H1 uses 'February 27, 2025' format (not February 27th or Feb 27)

checklist.name: Tag case conversion
checklist.description: Converts technical tags to lowercase-hyphenated format (cloudwatch-migration)

checklist.name: Tag type requirement
checklist.description: Includes required 'troubleshooting' tag for this incident type

checklist.name: Code block compliance
checklist.description: All code blocks include language specifiers, no bare backticks

checklist.name: Validation workflow
checklist.description: Runs validation script and addresses any compliance issues found
